content.question: For what value of the constant k does f have a critical point at x =1? For this value of k, determine whether f has a relative minimum, relative maximum, or neither at x = 1. Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: For what value of the constant k does f have a critical point at x =1? For this value of k, determine whether f has a relative minimum, relative maximum, or neither at x = 1. Justify your answer.

topic.text: 5.2: Extreme Value Theorem, Global Versus Local Extrema, and Critical Points

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
